thread.title: BRIEF-Willdan Group Inc Reports Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.36

title: BRIEF-Willdan Group Inc Reports Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.36
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Willdan Group Inc:
* WILLDAN GROUP INC QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.36 * WILLDAN GROUP INC QTRLY TOTAL CONTRACT REVENUE OF $64.2 MILLION, AN INCREASE OF 12% OVER PRIOR YEAR
* WILLDAN GROUP INC Q4 2017 NET REVENUE $31.1 MILLION VERSUS $28.4 MILLION
* WILLDAN GROUP INC Q4 2017 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.30
* WILLDAN GROUP INC SEES 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.60 TO $1.70
* WILLDAN GROUP INC SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.95 TO $2.05 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
